PrecisORDER AMENDING CERTAIN TEXTILE AND APPAREL REMISSION ORDERS, 2008 by reinstating some benefits for 2008 and 2009 and extending the Orders for an additional three-year period to December 31, 2012: - Tailored Collar Shirts Remission Order,1997; - Outerwear Greige Fabrics Remission Order, 1998; - Shirting Fabrics Remission Order, 1998; - Outerwear Apparel Remission Order, 1998; - Blouses, Shirts and Co-ordinates Remission Order, 1998; and - Outerwear Fabrics Remission Order, 1998.
